trustSignals.title: Safeguards families asked for
items: SOC2-aligned audit trail with immutable activity logs
24/7 concierge trust desk for escalations across regions
Optional clergy or community elder access with limited scopes

items.question: Can trusted friends edit my profile?
items.answer: No. They only view safety status, matches you share, and notes you invite them to leave.

items.question: Is my chat history visible?
items.answer: Never. We only surface metadata (date scheduled, verification status) so your private conversations stay yours.

items.question: How many trusted friends can I add?
items.answer: Up to three at launch. You control access start/end dates and can revoke instantly.

support.title: Need a custom setup?
